meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a pattern created by tie-dyeing the warp yarn before weaving.
meanings.sent1: The ikats had vibrant colors and unique designs.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful ikats dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The ikats fabric looked like a rainbow had been woven into it.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like a field of ikats in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The intricate ikats patterns danced before her eyes.

meanings.definition: The technique of creating patterns on fabric by tie-dyeing the warp yarn before weaving.
meanings.sent1: Learning the art of ikats requires patience and skill.
meanings.sent2: Artisans use ikats to add a touch of tradition to their work.
meanings.sent3: The ikats technique seemed like magic to the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Her mastery of ikats was like a symphony of colors coming together.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of ikats craftsmanship is truly mesmerizing.
